nodes.text: Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi (miniseries)

Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi is a Star Wars Legends comic book miniseries written by Tom Veitch. It is the first volume of the eponymous Star Wars: Tales of the Jedi maxiseries, and it was first published between 1993 and 1994 by Dark Horse Comics. The miniseries was later adapted into an audio drama.
